overview: Two college freshmen, Pol and Laya, accidentally meet during their last day of school in Baguio City. Laya is about to move back to Manila to escape from her failed romance, while Pol is about to spend a care-free night in a music festival. After witnessing Layaâ€™s breakdown because of her recent heartbreak, Pol gets an idea to make her last night in Baguio fun and memorable.
tagline: Don't leave it up to chance
title: Sakaling Maging Tayo
